name: Airways New Zealand Training Centre
about: At the Airways New Zealand Training Centre, we specialize in training the next generation of air traffic controllers and flight service officers. Our comprehensive program includes online self-directed learning, followed by intensive theory and practical training at our Christchurch facility. Students earn the New Zealand Certificate and Diploma in Air Traffic Services and undergo on-job training at various regional aerodrome towers and surveillance centres. We emphasize dedication, flexibility, and rigorous training to ensure our graduates are fully equipped to handle all air traffic situations, ultimately leading to the issuance of a New Zealand Civil Aviation Air Traffic Control or Flight Service licence. Our commitment to excellence and safety ensures our trainees are well-prepared for successful careers in air traffic services.
